title: E-Learning Practical Competency Enhancement: Design Research Paradigm Cyclic Simulation-Based Education

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can map four social science research paradigms to the design research process and explain them.
Learners can cycle through the design research process in a VR simulation environment to analyze real-world cases.
Learners can use the four core questions guiding design development research to create project proposals.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
